name: Pathstow Mystery VR
description: Pathstow Mystery VR is a mystic adventure game with a touch of horror and built from the ground up for VR. Created as a SteamVR exclusive it uses all advantages of Room-scale and SteamVR controllers.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 SP1 64 bit or newer Processor: Intel i5-4590, AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970/1060, AMD Radeon R9 490 equivalent or better DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 5 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 64 bit or newer Processor: Intel i7-5930K Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1080 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 5 GB available space
